name: Momus
description: Momus is the god of mockery, sencure, sarcasm, and reproach, as well as the guardian of writers and poets. He delights in exposing the flaws of gods and mortals, reveling in just critique.

skills.name: Deceptive Magic
skills.description: After using a skill, Momus grants himself a shield equal to 50% of ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: When gaining a shield, grants a shield with equal strength to the nearest ally. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Shield strength increases to 75% ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 100% ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Come at Me!
skills.description: Momus leaps into the center of the most enemy-clustered area, taunting nearby enemies for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Gains 25% DMG RED during the Ultimate.
upgrades.level3: Gains Super Armor during the Ultimate.
upgrades.level4: Gains 50% DMG RED during the Ultimate.

skills.name: Sweet Pain
skills.description: Whenever taking 20% max HP as DMG, Momus launches a counterattack in a small area, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK. This effect can trigger multiple times.

upgrades.level3: For each enemy unit hit, restores HP equal to 50% of ATK (up to 250% of ATK).
upgrades.level4: Reduces the DMG taken required to trigger the effect to 15% of max HP.

skills.name: Bomb Party
skills.description: Momus detonates a bouncing bomb, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and knocking down nearby enemies.

upgrades.level3: Hit units also have their CRIT Rate reduced by 25% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 260%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Phantom Puppet
relic.description: When Momus's HP drops below 50% for the first time, he becomes invisible and summons an Echo of himself (Passive). The Echo inherits 50% of his ATK and lasts 10s. Momus returns when the Echo falls.

upgrades.level2: If it's triggered during the Ultimate, he stealthes and summons an Echo to continue the Ultimate's taunt.
upgrades.level3: The Echo also inherits Momus's Sweet Pain.
upgrades.level4: Gains 1 more use, with a 10s CD between two uses. (Unlocks at Lv.281)
